title: Student Placed on Academic Probation
description: A student has received a notification that their GPA has dropped below 2.0 and they are on academic probation. They are calling for guidance.

tasks.description: Identify the student and confirm their academic probation status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the student's status in the SIS.

tasks.description: Explain what academic probation means and the requirements to return to good standing.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the university's policy and the GPA requirement.

tasks.description: Schedule a mandatory meeting for the student with their academic advisor to create an academic improvement plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the required meeting.
